item.title: Gpt Csrtrack Ocelot
item.description: Overview Here I am going to compare CSRTRack, OCELOT and GPT with application to CSR simulations in bunch compressors. The Zeuthen Benchmark Chicane The Zeuthen chicane is the standard chicane used in the literature when evaluting different CSR codes, and is accordingly used here. The chicane and beam parameters parameters are below. The chicane parameters are a subset of the ones on the website The beam parmaters (with compression) are the same as the ones outlined on the website except with a reduced energy from 5GeV to 0.
